description: What happens in the summertime when you put two equally handsome, muscular, hard-bodied and very horny men together? You get the perfect summer fling! Jean Franko and Pierce Paris are strangers who meet up on the beach, but they are definitely not strangers when it comes to the subject of hot anal sex! These two flip-flop all night and neither one is left unsatisfied.
title: Summer Flings Part 1
